inclusion.criterion: All diabetics irrespective of glucose control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All diabetics irrespective of treatment (oral hypoglycemic drugs/insulin)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: On systemic drug therapy such glucocorticoids and oral contraceptives
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, but meets inclusion criteria for all diabetics irrespective of glucose control or treatment. Exclusion criterion for Type 1 diabetes mellitus is a trigger.
